name: Fast MailerLite
author: FastFlow

sections.description:
Fast MailerLite is designed to work seamlessly with both the Fast Flow Dashboard and Fast Member

Once your contacts have been added to WordPress you now have the ability to sync their Fast Tags and Fast Member purchases.

Fast Tags can be used to trigger automations on any other integrated platform which is supported by our growing number Fast Flow addons.

NOTE: Fast MailerLite requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to enter the API details and utilise the user tagging.

https://wordpress.org/plugins/fast-flow-dashboard/

You can find out more about Fast Flow here

https://fastflow.io
sections.installation:
NOTE: This plugin requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to enter the MailerLite API settings.

Upload through your WordPress admin or via FTP.

Once uploaded simply activate and then navigate to the settings of the Fast Flow Dashboard and enter your MailerLite API details.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3

Update for error reporting

1.1.2.2

Fix for subscriber remove

1.1.2.1

Update for Fast Form action

1.1.2

  • Support for Fast Forms plugin

1.1.1

  • Update to group/tag sync behaviour – when no tags on Fast Flow will now keep tags on MailerLite and update FastFlow tags
  • Added webhook for syncing MailerLite group changes with Fast Tags

1.1.0

  • Prepared for repository release
